Module progettofinale.sailingclub
Package progettofinale.sailingclub.controller

Class StaffController

java.lang.Object
progettofinale.sailingclub.controller.Controller
progettofinale.sailingclub.controller.StaffController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class StaffController extends Controller implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The class StaffController represent the controller where we can control all the buttons and functionality of the Staff fxml file. This class inherit from Controller class.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    handleAddBoatM()
    This method is used to add a boat type object to the server database for a specific member and then the added boat is displayed in the GUI table.
    void
    handleAddMember()
    This method is used to add an object of type Member to the server database and then the added member is displayed in the GUI table.
    void
    handleAddRace()
    This method is used to add an object of type Race to the server database and then the added race is displayed in the GUI table.
    void
    handleChoiceMember()
    This method is used to display in a table called "boatTableS" in the GUI, all boats that have a member chosen from the combobox called "choiceMember".
    void
    handleChoiceRace()
    This method is used to display, in a combobox named "choiceRace" in the GUI, all the races present in the system.
    void
    handleRmvBoatM()
    This method is used to remove a boat type object from the server database and consequently from the respective GUI table.
    void
    handleRmvMember()
    This method is used to remove a Member type object from the server database and consequently from the respective GUI table.
    void
    handleRmvRace()
    This method is used to remove a Race type object from the server database and consequently from the respective GUI table.
    protected void
    handleSearchMemberFee()
    This method is used to search in a table called "tableFee" in the GUI, the membership fee payments of a Member by specifying the tax code of the member.
    protected void
    handleSearchParticipation()
    This method is used to search a table called "tableFee" in the GUI, for boat entry fee payments to participate in a race by specifying the tax ID of the boat owner or the race id or the boat id.
    protected void
    handleSearchStorage()
    This method is used to search in a table called "tableStorage" in the GUI, the storage fee payments of a boat by specifying the id of the boat or the tax code of the owner.
    protected void
    handleSendNoticeM()
    This method is used to send a notification of non-payment for a member's membership fee by specifying the tax ID of the member you want to warn.
    protected void
    handleSendNoticeS()
    This method is used to send a notification of non-payment for the storage fee of a member's boats, specifying the tax code of the member you want to warn.
    void
    handleUpdateFee()
    This method is used to update the membership fee that each member enrolled in the system must pay.
    void
    handleViewAllInscription()
    This method is used to display all participants of all races in the GUI table.
    void
    handleViewAllMemberFee()
    This method is used to display all membership fee payments made by members in the GUI table.
    void
    handleViewAllStorage()
    This method is used to display all storage fee payments made by members in the GUI table.
    void
    initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
    This method is used initialize a controller after its root element has been fully processed.
    void
    readRace()
    This method is used to display, in a combobox called "choiceRace" in the GUI, all the names of the race registered in the system.
    void
    readUsername()
    This method is used to display, in a combobox called "choiceMember" in the GUI, all the usernames of the members registered in the system.
    void
    viewMembers()
    This method is used to display, in a table called "tableMember" in the GUI, the list of all personal data of the members enrolled in the system.
    void
    viewMembership()
    This method is used to display in a table called "tableFee" in the GUI, the list of all payments of the membership fee of each Member with the tax code of the member and the date of payment.
    void
    viewRaceInscription()
    This method is used to display in a table called "tableRaceP" in the GUI, the list of all race entry fee payments made by members to enter their boats.
    void
    viewStorage()
    This method is used to display in a table called "tableStorage" in the GUI, the list of all payments of the storage fee of each boat with the tax code of the owner, the id of the boat, the fee paid and the date of payment.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This method is used initialize a controller after its root element has been fully processed.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - It is the location used to resolve relative paths for the root object or null if the location is unknown.
      resourceBundle - It is the resources used to locate the root object or null if the root object has not been located.

    • handleChoiceMember

      public void handleChoiceMember()
      This method is used to display in a table called "boatTableS" in the GUI, all boats that have a member chosen from the combobox called "choiceMember".

    • handleAddBoatM

      public void handleAddBoatM()
      This method is used to add a boat type object to the server database for a specific member and then the added boat is displayed in the GUI table.

    • viewStorage

      public void viewStorage()
      This method is used to display in a table called "tableStorage" in the GUI, the list of all payments of the storage fee of each boat with the tax code of the owner, the id of the boat, the fee paid and the date of payment.

    • handleSearchStorage

      protected void handleSearchStorage()
      This method is used to search in a table called "tableStorage" in the GUI, the storage fee payments of a boat by specifying the id of the boat or the tax code of the owner.

    • viewMembership

      public void viewMembership()
      This method is used to display in a table called "tableFee" in the GUI, the list of all payments of the membership fee of each Member with the tax code of the member and the date of payment.

    • handleUpdateFee

      public void handleUpdateFee()
      This method is used to update the membership fee that each member enrolled in the system must pay.
